Description: Ivory oval button seal with a pierced suspension hoop on the back, the base decorated with a representation of a running figure.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Dr David George Hogarth
Curator's comments: Zitman alternately suggests it is from shaft 53B.
Bibliographic references: Zitman 2010 / The necropolis of Assiut: a case study of local Egyptian funerary culture from the Old Kingdom to the end of the Middle Kingdom (II, 233)
